Class ContributorField¶

class app.field.ContributorField(name, value='')[source]¶

Bases: app.field.Field

The field for contributors. Multiple contributors must be separated by ‘ and ‘. The supported formats for individual names are defined in BibTeX<http://www.openoffice.org/bibliographic/bibtex-defs.html>:

  • Last
  • First Last
  • Last, First
  • First von Last
  • von Last, First
  • von Last, Jr, First
ET_AL = ('et al.', 'and others')¶
SPLIT = ' and '¶
__init__(name, value='')[source]¶
format()[source]¶
getACMValue()[source]¶

Get the names of the contributors in HTML following the ACM style. :rtype: str :return: The contributors in HTML. :raises: Exception: If a name is not in a legal format.

getContributors()[source]¶

Get the list of contributors. :rtype: list of Contributor :return: The list of contributors.

getContributorsCount()[source]¶

Get the number of contributors. :rtype: int :return: The number of contributors.

getFirstLastName()[source]¶

Get the last name of the first contributor. :rtype: str :return: The last name of the first contributor.

getFirstNameFirst(contributor)[source]¶
getFirstNameLast(contributor)[source]¶
getHTMLValue(firstNameOrder)[source]¶

Get the names of the contributors in HTML. :rtype: str :return: The contributors in HTML. :raises: Exception: If a name is not in a legal format.

getHtmlDefaultValue()[source]¶

Get the names of the contributors in HTML following the default style. :rtype: str :return: The contributors in HTML. :raises: Exception: If a name is not in a legal format.
